Key Match Events: Pakistan won the match by 5 wickets
Shan Masood provided the winning runs
Pre-Game Insights: The game was a virtual quarter-final
The outcome was dependent on the Netherlands beating South Africa
Post-Match Reflections: The win kept Pakistan's T20 World Cup dream alive
Bangladesh were left shellshocked by the controversial lbw decision
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Netherlands' win over South Africa was a major upset
The game was played on a worn wicket
Others: Shakib Al Hasan lost the review for his lbw dismissal
Mohammed Haris played a thrilling cameo
